name: Peopleware (Pplware) - NtmStyle
description:
ATTENTION!!!
This Script is OUTDATED and discontinued!!!
==================================================

This Script changes the way we see the site Peopleware (Pplware) [ http://pplware.sapo.pt ]

I do not say that this is a better way, i only say it is my way!
The style are optimized for 1024 pixels width minimum, this is not a problem since the original site is the same.

--- Screens taken with (v2.000) --- Sorry none of the screens are up. ---
HomePage
- Style Off [Size = ~2100KB | Pixels = 1001x6979] > link = http://goo.gl/LZdwr
- Style On [Size = ~1687KB | Pixels = 1001x5258 (save 1721 vertical pixels)] > link = http://goo.gl/NfEok

- Style Off [Size = ~1538KB | Pixels = 1001x14140] > link = http://goo.gl/78xr0
- Style On [Size = ~961KB | Pixels = 1001x6741 (save 7399 vertical pixels)] > link = http://goo.gl/fAlSH

- The site have a new style (Template v4.0), so i wrote a new script (FROM SCRATCH) for the new style.

########## (v1.100) ##########
- 1st public release.

--------------------------------------------------
Some features...
- Hide SAPO bar and ads.
- Hide useless (at least for me) side bar.
- Reading zone much larger.
- Reading zone font bigger, for a better and easy reading.
- Hide some more useless (at least for me) social networks links and others in the end of posts/articles.
- Comments zone much larger, with a bigger font and a complete new style. A major improvement for a better and easy reading.
- Saving a ton of total vertical space in the whole process and gaining a better visibility of the articles and comments.
